title: Options Exchanges Want to Scrap Fee Model That Makes ‘No Sense’
description: US equity options exchanges are seeking to change the way that regulatory fees are charged, moving away from a decades-old practice that allows them to pick up fees for business transacted on rival bourses.
content: US equity options exchanges are seeking to change the way that regulatory fees are charged, moving away from a decades-old practice that allows them to pick up fees for business transacted on rival bourses.
